pages.title: Nutrition Vat
pages.text: TODO This page is a placeholder for a feature which is still being developed.$(br2)Summary: Preserves embryos using nutrient solution. Can duplicate embryos, possibly needing souls and/or genetic plasmids based on stats. Circuits measure the remaining lifetime of
the stored item, in seconds before they spoil.$(br2)There will be a <bobo>bobo/$ feature on this page, when it's added.$(br2)
